extendedInfo.description: Quick Agenda is a customizable agenda view that displays Google/Touchdown events and tasks from various applications (full list below) and Contact Birthdays. Looks like there is a bug with sharing/choosing touchdown tasks, I will fix this soon!It also has a widget which allows you to choose an event to display alongside upcoming events.This free application has unlock able "paid" features accessible in the settings. You can use the app for free without ever unlocking any features! For a full run down of the advantages of paid-ness visit the website!PAID features are currently at an introductory price, this will go up in around a months time!If you are looking for a business calendar widget to display many events please try Agenda Widget, conversely, If you want a sleek, compact, customizable widget to show a few upcoming events (and a chosen event) try Quick Agenda!Feature list:- a widget that can show one upcoming event/task, either the next event or and event chosen by you- an quick loading agenda view that combines calendars and tasks from various data sources- swipe actions in quick agenda view- an ICS (iCal) receiver/sender. The send function is still primitive however the receiving function handles most cases as it is based on icsbot-*lots* of skin and color customizations for all components of the widget, initial look matches Simi clockIf you would like to unlock the full version features you can do it in the application from widget settings or the app drawer icon settings page.Support for:- Google calendar- Touchdown exchange- Astrid- Google tasks organizer (GTO)- SSI gTasks- Dato gTasks- Got To Do tasks- Calengoo tasks- Due Today tasksProvide feedback here in comments, via e-mail.

reviews.title: brilliant
reviews.comment: I need more stars to rate the app and this dev :) 6 stars from me please. its just too good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks good
reviews.comment: Great but could do with more than 5 rows on widget so it shows more future tasks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: I was looking for a widget that would be able to do exactly what this one does. Well done. So far everything is perfect.
reviews.author: Konrad Korczynski

reviews.title: Was great, now quite poor
reviews.comment: Has a bug that causes the screen to turn on about every two minutes - unfixed for almost a year.  Choosing calendars is an exercise in frustration - sometimes your selections stick, sometimes they don\'t. Can\'t find a similarly simple app, but I\'m finally giving up on this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problem with 4.2
reviews.comment: I bought this a year or two ago. It is really great and I highly recommend it for any OS up to 4.1. Once I updated to 4.2 this would turn my screen back on after manually turning it off. I used another app to track down what was causing it and it was this widget. I removed it and the problem went away. Like I said, a great product overall just a problem with the latest OS upgrade.
reviews.author: A Google User
